    • CCF Color Palette

    Reference

    All functions

    ccf_colors

    Named list of CCF brand colors

    ccf_cols()

    Function to extract colors from ccf_colors as hex codes

    ccf_pal()

    Return function to interpolate a CCF color palette

    ccf_palette()

    Access the colors in a CCF branded color palette

    ccf_palettes

    CCF branded color palettes

    ez_analysis_template

    EZ analysis project template

    lowerchar()

    Convert to lowercase

    set_ccf_palette()

    Set CCF color palette

    tabna()

    Cross-tabulation with useNA = "ifany"

    theme_ezbasic()

    Basic theme preferences for ggplot

    todate()

    Convert to date format
